00000002 ; patadr, pattern address 0100
00000042 ; 0x21 << 1
00000000
00000001
00000004 ; 2450 MHz 
00000004
00000080
00000008
00000008
00000092
00000004 ; Mode opcode, set RF_GATE ON (VSW always ON)
0000000e
00000007
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000004 ; CALPWR 0v for full power, DAC A & B 
0000001C
00000000 ; 4 LSB's
00000000 ; 8 MSB's
00000017 ; Write both DAC's
00000000
00000004 ; Mode opcode, set RF_GATE OFF (VSW always ON)
0000000e
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000 ; 
00000000
